price: Nama onnee qulqulluudhaan Rabbitti dhufe malee.
arabic: إِلَّا مَنۡ أَتَى ٱللَّهَ بِقَلۡبٖ سَلِيمٖ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: illā man atā al-laha biqalbin salīmin
